bug.summary: Long running test `pbt.py` seems to OOM after running for a day.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Long running test pbt.py seems to OOM after running for a day. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18510752/89354845-ca7a9800-d66e-11ea-9b9b-6f3b6656553b.png></denchmark-link>
You can see some of workers use lots of memory (5GB). <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): Run pbt.py for a long time.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment: Closing stale issue since the latest release passes. Please re-open if it is still a problem.
